name: TRAFICO
description: Explore the depths of the international drug trade by engaging in combat as either an elite member of a Military DEA unit or as a member of one of the world's most dangerous cartels.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 (64 bit) Processor: Intel i3 4160 / AMD A-4000 or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GT 720 (2 GB) / Radeon r7 250 (2 GB) or equivalent Storage: 10 GB available space Sound Card: 5.1
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 (64 bit) Processor: Intel i7 6700k / AMD FX8350 or equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 (4 GB) / Radeon r7 370 (4 GB) or better Storage: 12 GB available space Sound Card: 5.1
